description: An object to describe a subject's timepoint in the study, typically used for when samples were taken.

visit_number.title: A sequential number that is assigned as visits occur for that subject.

visit_id.title: The identifier used by the sequence center to uniquely identify the visit.

date.title: Date when the visit occurred. Can be different from sample dates, a visit may encompass a set of sampling points.

interval.title: The amount of time since the last visit (in days). Use 0 for the first visit.

clinic_id.title: The identifier used by the sequence center to uniquely identify where the visit occurred.

tags.title: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.
